message: I propose we split the money 7000 for me and 3000 for you. Let me know if this works for you.
I'll give you 4000, but I think I deserve more. Your turn to counteroffer!
Considering the inflation, I think it's fair to split the money equally. This way, neither of us loses out too much. What do you think?
I'm willing to give you a slightly larger share, but I still think I deserve a bit more. Your turn to counteroffer!
